RT @giuseppegurgone: Italian cuisine specific:

- you need to distinguish and taste the (few) ingredients 
- don’t put pesto or garlic ever…

Italian cuisine specific:

- you need to distinguish and taste the (few) ingredients 
- don’t put pesto or garlic everywhere 
- there is no such thing as creamy X
- a piece of meat with spaghetti is no-no
- put the cheese on your pizza half way into baking
